title: Interview With Iraj Weerarathne vs upul shantha sannasgala against Suratha
description:
Celebrated Producer Iraj Weeraratne speaks to newshub regarding his latest music video 'Suratha'. Vows to fight against those who denounce Buddhism through lewd publications.
Yesterday Sinhala Teacher Upul Shantha Sannasgala blamed iraj for misusing his character and hit book Adaraneeya wassanaya and Amma.also asked how Iraj used the president maitreepala sirisenas voice (speech about amarabandu rupasinghe).Also he questioned about budunge rasthiyaduwa book.Iraj knows how to trend his music videos on youtube while tv derana teledrama deweni inima by saranga mendis know how to trend their drama on youtube.

comments.comment:
Me comment karala thiyena sama harak  bauddayo da kiyala sekai.
 Sannsgalayai ara catholic kiya gaththa buruwo dethun denai ekathuwela  nirwasthran paraman sukan kiyala poth gahanakota umbalata ridune ne neda? 
 A poth gahapu pahara nadege redi gakawapu Irajge vediowata umbalata riduna neda?
  Nodakin mun bauddayo da?
 Methana tika denek anaagamwala aya budunge darshayata garu karala daala thiyena comment dekkama bauddayo kiya ganna anith un aththatama bauddayo da kiyala hitenawa.
  Mahindata Gotata garu garanawa kade yanawa kiwama bauddayange hithwala thiyena kuhaka millejja gathiya lewginnak wage mathu una. Lajja weyaw muslim cristiyan minissu budunge dahamata garu karaddi mahindai gotai nisa wairaya pathurana wasalayo unata.
